dialog.text: Well, I am feeling very sad because I tested positive for Covid this week. And I am in quarantine away from my family.
I am sorry to hear that, Covid is really making things difficult. How long have you been in quarantine?
beam_texts: I am sorry to hear that, Covid is really making things difficult. How long have you been in quarantine?

dialog.text: Since the beginning of the month.
beam_texts: Since the beginning of the month.

dialog.text: I know this is a very difficult time for you, especially with being away from your family. Have you been able to talk to them at all since the beginning of the month?
beam_texts: I know this is a very difficult time for you, especially with being away from your family. Have you been able to talk to them at all since the beginning of the month?
